name: mcm_controller
label: IBM MCM Controller Definition
description: Data structure describing connection details for an IBM Multicloud Manager Controller.

attributes.name: icp_url
attributes.description: IBM MCM Controller management console URL. Example https://<hostname>:<port>.
attributes.label: IBM MCM Controller Management Console URL

attributes.name: icp_admin_user
attributes.description: Username for connecting to the IBM MCM Controller management console.
attributes.label: IBM MCM Controller Admin User Name

attributes.name: icp_admin_password
attributes.description: Password for connecting to the IBM MCM Controller management console.
attributes.label: IBM MCM Controller Admin User Password

attributes.name: mcm_hub_endpoint
attributes.description: API endpoint of IBM MCM Controller. Example https://<hostname>:<port>.
attributes.label: IBM MCM Controller API endpoint
